topic.title: ZeroNet Social?
topic.body: There is a Facebook-like site in ZeroNet? Or a project?

topic.title: ZeroBar, apre il nuovo ZeroTalk italiano
topic.body:
Visto che quello vecchio non si apre nemmeno ho creato un nuovo forum in italiano:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1P9qvAGsMCPX93J96AywfXBsTgK1A96mfH

2_1LY5srf6iJSafm2bZRvb9QdZdEEvC7kuUS.body:
> [sirenyc](#comment_24_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ): https://www.facebook.com/HelloZeroNet
> https://twitter.com/HelloZeroNet

A social network in ZeroNet, not about ZeroNet. ;)
